title: Do you like orange? Orange fruit or Airwheel X3 Orange good quality one-wheeled Scooter
text: Do you like orange? Orange fruit or Airwheel X3 Orange good quality one-wheeled Scooter Now, the Airwheel Technology has released Airwheel X3 Orange Limited to meet more users’ demand. The Airwheel editor will lead us to have a close look at the Airwheel X3 Orange Limited. United States, 29 September 2015 -- Fruitarian eating is the lightest of all diets and gives us our "lightest" body, and we become most sensitive on fruit. Do you like eating orange? Could you tell the reason? Orange is one of the most-eaten fruit in daily life. It is full of vitamin C that can improve the body's ability to resist bacteria violations. The orange has inhibitory effect on many kinds of cancer. And many people like to eat orange just like its orange colour. Now, the Airwheel Technology has released Airwheel X3 Orange Limited to meet more users’ demand. The Airwheel editor will lead us to have a close look at the Airwheel X3 Orange Limited, single wheeled electric scooter. The Airwheel Self-balancing Electric Scooter X3 Limited Orange Edition is the new favourite among young people, which is the inspiration to the dashing Airwheel X3 limited edition with passionate orange shade. Thanks to the advanced casing material mounted with Nano silica gel, the Airwheel X3 Limited Orange has the following merits, for instance, high resilience, flame retardant, abrasion resistance, oxidation resistance, high resilience; easy-cleaning and ultra-comfort are included. Can you image the Airwheel X3 Limited Orange an electric self-balancing unicycle has so many advantagesAs a self- balancing electric unicycle, the intelligent balancing chip is essential. Escort the rider’s way with Airwheel intelligent protection system: intelligent balancing chip, fuzzy algorithm & aviation attitude control technology. On the other hand, Airwheel X3 electric one wheel Limited Orange is ultra-powerful & quiet. Because magnetic levitation motor which is the latest technology, replaces the bearing with magnetic suspension for longer life expectancy. Its max speed is about 18km/h, alert activated at 12km/h. Based on the above description, Airwheel X3 Limited Orange Edition will become the favourite one of the person who loves both bright orange and scooter. # # #
